subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Here's a question...
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Chris Moon aside, I don't think there's any way you have of knowing.
Especially when predicting something to happen in the future. All you can do
is wait and see if it happens or not.

It's even more difficult than telling if one of your friends is lying, which
can be difficult enough sometimes.

Zack
